snippet: “Antifragile,” Nassim Nicholas Taleb’s follow-up to his “Black Swan,” argues that top-down efforts to eliminate volatility in public and private lives end up making things more fragile, not less.
abstract: Michiko Kakutani reviews book Antifragile: Things That Gain From Disorder by Nassim Nicholas Taleb.
lead_paragraph: “Antifragile,” Nassim Nicholas Taleb’s follow-up to his “Black Swan,” argues that top-down efforts to eliminate volatility in public and private lives end up making things more fragile, not less.

headline.main: You Are All Soft! Embrace Chaos!
headline.print_headline: You Are All Soft! Embrace Chaos!
